page.title: 08Marldon's T.V.Watching.
page.content: We asked adults about T.V. All asked had a least 1 T.V. colour set and all adults watched some T.V. The{favourite {programmes were}sport, "soap operas" like 'Dynasty' and 'Crossroads' & quiz shows. 80% watched'soap operas "Dallas coming favourite. 1/2 the sample had a video recorder & watched programmes taped at home. They also hired a tape from a shop at least once a week. The average viewing time of{children {between 7 & 9 years} was 16 hours each week.The average for the 9 to 11 years rose to 26 hours a week. Apart from one soap opera all the favourite programmes watched by the younger children were cartoons that were shown around tea time. The older children also enjoyed watchng cartoons but the favourite programmes were more varied, often adult programmes and late in the evening.
